tool_description: This API gives you the tools to find high-quality data on over 875,000 branded, grocery, and generic foods. You can also use this API to get nutrition data for thousands of raw ingredients. This API supports barcode lookup, searching by name, advanced searches using 10+ filters, and searching using a single ingredient or a set of ingredients. We provide ingredients, packaging info (size and photos), serving info, nutrients (micro and macro), diet labels (vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free), flagged ingredients, allergens, trace ingredients, countries where sold, palm oil ingredients, and more.
name: Chomp Food & Nutrition Database v2
title: Chomp Food & Nutrition Database v2

api_list.name: /food/branded/barcode.php
api_list.description: Get data for a branded food using the food's UPC/EAN barcode.

api_list.name: /food/branded/name.php
api_list.description: Search for branded food items by name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Search for branded food items using a general food name keyword. This does not have to exactly match the "official" name for the food.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Set maximum number of records you want the API to return. The default value is "10."

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: This is how you paginate the search result. By default, you will see the first 10 records. You must increment the page number to access the next 10 records, and so on. The default value is "1."

api_list.name: /food/branded/search.php
api_list.description: Search for branded food items using various parameters.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: This is how you paginate the search result. By default, you will see the first 10 records. You must increment the page number to access the next 10 records, and so on. The default value is "1."

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that are sold in a specific country.

optional_parameters.name: palm_oil
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific ingredient from palm oil.

optional_parameters.name: mineral
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific mineral.

optional_parameters.name: trace
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific trace ingredient.

optional_parameters.name: nutrient
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific nutrient.

optional_parameters.name: diet
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that are considered compatible with a specific diet. Valid diets: Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten Free

optional_parameters.name: vitamin
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific vitamin.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that are owned by a specific brand.

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific keyword.

optional_parameters.name: ingredient
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific ingredient.

optional_parameters.name: allergen
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods that contain a specific allergen.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Set maximum number of records you want the API to return. The default value is 10.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search to only include branded foods from a specific category.

api_list.name: /food/ingredient/search.php
api_list.description: Get data for a specific ingredient or a specific set of ingredients.

required_parameters.name: find
required_parameters.description: Search our database for a single ingredient or a specific set of ingredients. Example #1: Single Ingredient "&find=raw broccoli". Example #2: Set of Ingredients "&find=raw broccoli,raw cauliflower,mashed potatoes". Comma-separated lists cannot contain more than 10 ingredients. You must perform additional API calls if you are looking up more than 10 ingredients.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Set maximum number of records you want the API to return, per search term. The default value is "1."
